data.name: XNamedRange
desc: provides access to the settings of a named range in a spreadsheet document.

methods.name: getContent
desc: returns the content of the named range.
The content can be a reference to a cell or cell range or any formula expression.

methods.name: getReferencePosition
desc: returns the position in the document which is used as a base for relative references in the content.

methods.name: getType
desc: returns the type of the named range.
This is a combination of flags as defined in NamedRangeFlag.

methods.name: setContent
desc: sets the content of the named range.
The content can be a reference to a cell or cell range or any formula expression.

methods.name: setReferencePosition
desc: sets the position in the document which is used as a base for relative references in the content.

methods.name: setType
desc: sets the type of the named range.
